name: Product Defects – Functional
messageRegex: (?i).*(AssertionError|expected .* but found .*|should be .*|did not appear|state mismatch|object to not be null|expected to be null|order preview page failed).*

name: Email Delivery / Notifications
messageRegex: .*(Invite email not received|No invitation email arrived|No reminder email arrived|not received in time|PTZM expected object).*

name: Reports & PDF Downloads
messageRegex: .*(No PDF file downloaded|PDF did not appear|report PDF|AGT Full Report expected object).*

name: UI / Timing / Flaky – Selenium / Browser
traceRegex: .*(TimeoutException|Renderer timeout|NoSuchElementException|StaleElementReferenceException|ElementClickInterceptedException|Detached frame|Transient WebDriverException|target frame detached|stale element reference).*

name: Test / Data / Fixtures
messageRegex: .*(NullPointerException|IllegalStateException|fixture not found|Large team fixture not found|configuration error|test data mismatch|alias token missing).*

name: Skipped / Config Guards
messageRegex: .*(Admin credentials missing|Profile user credentials missing|MAILSLURP_FORCE|skipped due to config|SkipException).*
